org.apache.polygene.spi.entitystore

Interface BackupRestore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileEntityStoreService, JdbmEntityStoreService, MemoryEntityStoreService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileEntityStoreMixin, JdbmEntityStoreMixin, MemoryMapEntityStoreMixin

    public interface BackupRestore
    Allow backups and restores of data in an EntityStore to be made

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stream<String> backup()
      Backup entity states.
      default Consumer<Stream<String>> restore()
      Restore entity states.
      void restore(Stream<String> states)
      Restore entity states.

    • Method Detail

      • backup

        Stream<String> backup()
        Backup entity states.
        Returns:
        Stream of serialized entity states, must be closed

      • restore

        void restore(Stream<String> states)
        Restore entity states.
        Parameters:
        states - Stream of serialized entity states

      • restore

        default Consumer<Stream<String>> restore()
        Restore entity states.
        Returns:
        A consumer of streams of serialized entity states
